name: Madness
description: You a hero, so have to explore a world full of dangers. overcome various difficulties, traps and demons.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This game has the best strory I've seen in a game since Leisure Suit Larry or Undertale.   Also, the ambiance in each world makes it feel so much more alive.   I overcome various difficulties, traps and demons.   What really sold me for this game was a lot of bosses, is different complexity of battlefield.  Do yourself a favor and buy it now.
